title: (x) epi and oregano font ID - Kari, Cocktail Shaker {Tamas, Nina}
content:
here are links to JPgs of the two fonts I would love to figure out...

[http://up6.podbean.com/image-logos/21849\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104221/http:/up6.podbean.com/image-logos/21849_logo.jpg)

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ptfolio/2667009265/in/set-72157602355244068/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104221/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ptfolio/2667009265/in/set-72157602355244068/)

any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/epi_3610.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2667009265_97577c9ef3%20(1)_4567.jpg)
author: mikehedge

comments.content:
Epicurious is Kari from Positype.

--- Tamas Ferencz ---
"Oregano" should be [Cocktail Shaker](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104221/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/cocktail-shaker/). I'd suspect that curl in the "O" to be custom.
aah you guys rock!!!! thanks a million!
